dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: stratumComposition
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about the coverage of a single taxon within a specific stratum.
entity.entityDescription: Recognizing that a given taxon may exist within multiople strata, this entity was included as an intersection between the taxonObservation and strata tables to provide a location of lateral percent coverage of a given taxon within a specific stratum.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a unique existence of a given taxon within a strata defined to be within a plot.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the taxonObservation table that points to a specific taxon recognized within the plot observation.
attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a given taxon within a plot observation.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the STRATA table.
attribute.attDefinition: Name of the stratum in which the species occurs. Because a single species may occur in more than one stratum this attribute has a many to one relationship with a single species.

attribute.attNotes: Because workers use various coverage classification schemes, there will have to either be a 'metadata table' or 'normalization alogrithm' in order to relate percent coverage's using the various classification schemes.
attribute.attDefinition: Percent coverage of a given species within the given stratum.
